CustomField.description: Billing Quantity is calculated as follows : - If Billing Source = Contracted -> Billing Quantity = Overwrite Quantity if not 0 otherwise Forecast Quantity up to Capped Quantity - Updated by Workflow - If Billing Source = DFP Actuals ->Billing Quantity = Overwrite Quantity if not 0 otherwise DFP Actuals up to Capped Quantity - If Billing Source = 3rd Party Actuals -> Billing Quantity = Overwrite Quantity if not 0 otherwise 3rd Party Actuals up to Capped Quantity
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Billing Quantity calculated from Forecast, Overwrite, Contracted and Capped fields.
CustomField.label: Billing Quantity
